#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
	int sum, input, dec, un;
	char t;
	int Arr[10] = { 0, 1, 7, 8, 14, 19, 25, 26, 32, 33 };

	while(1)
	{
		while ((t = getchar()) < 48 )
			if (t == 35) return 0;
		ungetc(t, stdin);
		sum = 0;
		scanf("%d", &input);
		if (input == 2)
		{
			sum = 5;
		}
		else
		{
			dec = input / 10;
			un = input % 10;
			sum = (dec*33 + Arr[un] + 6)%10;
		}
		printf("%d\n", sum);
	}
	return 0;
}
